name:
At Sundown, and other poems
Part 5 from Volume IV of The Works of John Greenleaf Whittier
author: Whittier, J. G. (John Greenleaf)
Whittier, John G. (John Greenleaf)
Whittier, John Greenleaf
body:
For love to fill. Our nakedness of soul
Brings to that Gate no toll;
Giftless we come to Him, who all things gives,
And live because He lives.
